title: Neuron Scarf santiago ramón y cajal
description: Santiago Ramón y Cajal is known as one of the great fathers of neuroscience. He produced brilliant works of art on his studies of the nervous system. We thought that one of his great neuron illustrations would make a beautiful scarf. It is printed on a lightweight viscose material that will hold its shape. It measures approximately 140 inches by 30 inches. It is beautiful and unique and it would make a great gift for a neuroscientist, scientist, biologist, psychologists or any one with "potential" :)
